findings.title: #1 State variables that could be declared constant
findings.description: Add the `constant` attributes to state variables that never change

findings.title: #2 Unused return values
findings.description: Ensure that all the return values of the function calls are used and handle both success and failure cases if needed by the business logic

findings.title: #4 Naming convention
findings.description: Use mixedCase naming convention for following function setMarketWallerAddress instead with a lowercase m for market
